/mnt/cuda_disk/usr/local/cuda-12.1/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_elementwise.dir/tests/test_elementwise.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_elementwise.dir/src/elementwise/elementwise_add.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_elementwise.dir/src/elementwise/activations.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/test_elementwise.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
